TABLE.NAME: cado
TABLE.COMMENT: This is the main database table for mod CADO

FIELD.NAME: timegenerated
FIELD.COMMENT: Time cado is generated or regenerated

FIELD.NAME: timeproposed
FIELD.COMMENT: Time cado is proposed, 0 if not proposed or not approved

FIELD.NAME: generateuser
FIELD.COMMENT: User who has last generated cado or proposed cado

FIELD.NAME: approveuser
FIELD.COMMENT: User who has been requested to approve cado, or if timeapproved is set, then has approved the cado

FIELD.NAME: approvecomment
FIELD.COMMENT: Comment by approver, regardless of whether approved or not approved

FIELD.NAME: cadocomment
FIELD.COMMENT: One of the free text fields available

FIELD.NAME: cadobiblio
FIELD.COMMENT: One of the free text fields available

FIELD.NAME: cadointro
FIELD.COMMENT: One of the free text fields available
